vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: come/approach
1) to come near, approach, enter into, draw near
1a) (Qal) to approach, draw near
1b) (Niphal) to be brought near
1c) (Piel) to cause to approach, bring near, cause to draw near
1d) (Hiphil) to bring near, bring, present
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   aproximarse; (b) nif.   acercar; (c) pi.   hacer aproximarse, traer cerca; (d)   llevar, cargar; (e) hif.   acercar, traer, ofrecer
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 靠近, 到達, 接近
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 接近, 靠近
1a2) (時間的) 臨近
1b) (Niphal) 被帶近
1c) (Piel) 使靠近, 帶近, 使接近
1d) (Hiphil) 帶來, 呈獻
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 靠近, 到达, 接近
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 接近, 靠近
1a2) (时间的) 临近
1b) (Niphal) 被带近
1c) (Piel) 使靠近, 带近, 使接近
1d) (Hiphil) 带来, 呈献

: bring/offer
1) to come near, approach, enter into, draw near
1a) (Qal) to approach, draw near
1b) (Niphal) to be brought near
1c) (Piel) to cause to approach, bring near, cause to draw near
1d) (Hiphil) to bring near, bring, present
